blogPost.excerpt:
P!nk + Willow Sage Hart // “Cover Me In Sunshine” // Out Now!
Stream/Download // https://smarturl.it/CMIS
 
Connect with P!NK:
https://tiktok.com/@pinkofficial
https://facebook.com/pink 
https://twitter.com/pink 
https://instagram.com/pink 
https://pinkspage.com 

____

“Cover Me In Sunshine”
 
I’ve been dreaming 
friendly faces
I’ve got so much time to kill
 
just imagine 
people laughing
I know some day we will
 
and even if it’s far away
get me through another day
 
cover me in sunshine
shower me with good times
tell me that the world’s been spinning since the beginning 
and everything’ll be alright
cover me in sunshine
 
from a distance 
all these mountains
are just some tiny hills
 
wildflowers 
they keep living 
while they’re just standing still 
 
I’ve been missing yesterday 
but what if theres a better place
 
cover me in sunshine
shower me with good times
tell me that the world’s been spinning since the beginning 
and everything’ll be alright
cover me in sunshine
shower me with good times
tell me that the world’s been spinning since the beginning 
and everything’ll be alright
cover me in sunshine
 
La la la 
 
cover me in sunshine
shower me with good times
tell me that the world’s been spinning since the beginning 
and everything’ll be alright
cover me in sunshine

#pink #willowsagehart #covermeinsunshine

localize.title: P！nk, Willow Sage Hart - Cover Me In Sunshine (Official Video)
localize.description:
P!nk + Willow Sage Hart // "Cover Me In Sunshine" //现已推出!
流动/下载 // https://smarturl.it/CMIS
 
与P！NK联系。
https://tiktok.com/@pinkofficial
https://facebook.com/pink 
https://twitter.com/pink 
https://instagram.com/pink 
https://pinkspage.com 

____

"在阳光下掩护我"
 
我一直在做梦 
亲切的面孔
我有很多时间可以打发
 
试想 
众笑
我知道有一天我们会
 
纵然远在天边
熬日子
 
阳光普照
饮酒作乐
告诉我，世界自始至终都在旋转。
一切都会好起来的
阳光普照
 
远远 
群山
只是一些小山丘
 
野花 
苟延残喘 
静止不动 
 
我昨天失踪了 
但如果有更好的地方呢
 
阳光普照
饮酒作乐
告诉我，世界自始至终都在旋转。
一切都会好起来的
阳光普照
饮酒作乐
告诉我，世界自始至终都在旋转。
一切都会好起来的
阳光普照
 
啦啦啦 
 
阳光普照
饮酒作乐
告诉我，世界自始至终都在旋转。
一切都会好起来的
阳光普照

"在陽光下掩護我"
 
我一直在做夢 
親切的面孔
我有很多時間可以打發
 
試想 
衆笑
我知道有一天我們會
 
縱然遠在天邊
熬日子
 
陽光普照
飲酒作樂
告訴我，世界自始至終都在旋轉。
一切都會好起來的
陽光普照
 
遠遠 
羣山
只是一些小山丘
 
野花 
苟延殘喘

我昨天失蹤了

一切都會好起來的
